name: Mazes of Magento
description:
"Dare ye enter the Mazes of Magento?"

Mazes of Magento is a first-person 3D shooter inspired by the countless hours I spent grinding away at "Dungeons of Daggorath" on my old TRS-80 Color Computer. Guide the protagonist through the mazes while avoiding the various denizens that inhabit the strange dimension of Magento. The protagonist can die one of three ways: by having their lives reduced to zero by colliding with any of the denizens of the Maze; by exhausting all of their magic orb  ammo; or by running out of time to complete the Maze level.

Controls:

Movement:W,A,S,D

Fire Magic Orb: Space Bar

All assets, including pixel art and music/sound effects were created specifically for this project, with the exception of Magento's evil laugh, which was provided via SoundEffectsFactory: http://bit.ly/1eZd17n
